page.title: 16Crops.
page.content: There are loads of different kinds of crops. Here are just some of those grown locally.{Winter Barley}is drilled in Autumn. Before drilling the land has to be worked until it is fine enough.The land will be disced or power harrowed and then fertilized. The same thing is done for{Winter {wheat}and{Spring Barley.}Before the crop is ready, it will be sprayed or top dressed, which means spreading fertilizer or nitrogen on the crop.Combines are used to harvest the corn. The combine cuts the corn, separates the grain from the straw, puts the grain in a tank and throws the straw out of the back.After that the straw is baled and the field is ploughed ready for the next crop. By Neil Wilkinson,aged 10.
